## FetchStateSummary interface

Summary of the fetch state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface FetchStateSummary 
```

[peers\_on\_backoff](./client.fetchstatesummary.peers_on_backoff.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Map&lt;string, number&gt;


</td><td>

The peer URL for nodes that are currently on backoff because of failed fetch requests, and the timestamp when that backoff will expire.

If peers are in here then they are not being used as potential sources in \[`FetchStateSummary::pending_requests`<!-- -->\].


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[pending\_requests](./client.fetchstatesummary.pending_requests.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Record&lt;[HoloHashB64](./client.holohashb64.md)<!-- -->, string\[\]&gt;


</td><td>

The op ids that are currently being fetched.

Each op id is associated with one or more peer URL from which the op data could be requested.


</td></tr>
